scripts.update-stack: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name urlcheck-api --template-url https://s3.amazonaws.com/urlcheck-api/template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=DatabaseUrlParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_database_url && aws cloudformation wait stack-update-complete --stack-name urlcheck-api
scripts.create-stack: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name urlcheck-api --template-url https://s3.amazonaws.com/urlcheck-api/template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=DatabaseUrlParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_database_url && aws cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name urlcheck-api
scripts.upload-deploy: zip -r deploy.zip src node_modules && aws s3 cp deploy.zip s3://urlcheck-api/deploy.zip
scripts.setup: aws s3api create-bucket --bucket urlcheck-api --region eu-west-1 --create-bucket-configuration LocationConstraint=eu-west-1
scripts.create: npm run upload-deploy && npm run upload-swagger && npm run upload-template && npm run create-stack
scripts.update: npm run upload-swagger && npm run upload-template && npm run update-stack
scripts.update-code: npm run upload-deploy && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name urlcheck-api-probe-candidates --s3-bucket urlcheck-api --s3-key deploy.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name urlcheck-api-probe-results --s3-bucket urlcheck-api --s3-key deploy.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name urlcheck-api-probe-check-results --s3-bucket urlcheck-api --s3-key deploy.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name urlcheck-api-check-get-by-id --s3-bucket urlcheck-api --s3-key deploy.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name urlcheck-api-user-get-by-username --s3-bucket urlcheck-api --s3-key deploy.zip
scripts.delete: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name urlcheck-api && aws cloudformation wait stack-delete-complete --stack-name urlcheck-api
